    • withIndependentScrolling

      public Page.PageBuilder withIndependentScrolling()
      Enable independent scrolling for this page. The page content will have its own scrollbar and scroll independently from the shell/navbar. Useful for lazy loading content or creating scrollable containers.
      Returns:
      this builder for method chaining

    • withStickySidebar

      public Page.PageBuilder withStickySidebar(Component stickyComponent, int mainWidth, int sidebarWidth)
      Add a sticky sidebar to this page layout. The sticky component will appear on the right side and follow the user as they scroll. It will have its own scrollbar if content exceeds the viewport height.

      Note: Call this method BEFORE adding rows/components to ensure content is added to the main area.

      Parameters:
      stickyComponent - the component to display in the sticky sidebar
      mainWidth - the width of the main content area (1-12 columns)
      sidebarWidth - the width of the sticky sidebar (1-12 columns)
      Returns:
      this builder for method chaining

    • withStickySidebar

      public Page.PageBuilder withStickySidebar(Component stickyComponent)
      Add a sticky sidebar to this page layout with default widths (8 columns main, 4 columns sidebar).

      Note: Call this method BEFORE adding rows/components to ensure content is added to the main area.

      Parameters:
      stickyComponent - the component to display in the sticky sidebar
      Returns:
      this builder for method chaining

    • build

      public Page build()
